short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your local alternative for online shopping!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
While shopping around on Amazon, open this extension and it will display local Shopify stores in your area that carry the same product you're looking at or similar products!

After the app is installed, any time you open the extension on an Amazon product page or search page, the extension will search for Shopify stores in your area that carry your product. 

Click on the price and you will be brought to a page where you can buy that same product and support local business!

NOTE: Shopify stores download our Harvester for Merchants Shopify app to their store's website, which allows us to transfer the information about their products to you. If the Merchant does not have our Shopify app installed, you will note be able to see their products.
